TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SipAudioCall extends Java.Lang.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android31.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")]
[<System.Runtime.Versioning.ObsoletedOSPlatform("android31.0", "This class is obsoleted in this android platform")>]

Docs.summary: Handles an Internet audio call over SIP.

remarks.para:
Handles an Internet audio call over SIP. You can instantiate this class with SipManager, using SipManager#makeAudioCall makeAudioCall() and SipManager#takeAudioCall takeAudioCall().

Note: Using this class require the android.Manifest.permission#INTERNET and android.Manifest.permission#USE_SIP permissions. In addition, #startAudio requires the android.Manifest.permission#RECORD_AUDIO, android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_WIFI_STATE, and android.Manifest.permission#WAKE_LOCK permissions; and #setSpeakerMode setSpeakerMode() requires the android.Manifest.permission#MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS permission.

Developer Guides
For more information about using SIP, read the Session Initiation Protocol developer guide.
This member is deprecated. android.net.sip.SipManager and associated classes are no longer supported and should not be used as the basis of future VOIP apps.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the timeout value in seconds. Default value (defined by SIP protocol) is used if timeout is zero or negative.
Docs.summary: Answers a call.

remarks.para: Answers a call. The attempt will be timed out if the call is not established within timeout seconds and Listener#onError onError(SipAudioCall, SipErrorCode.TIME_OUT, String) will be called.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the SIP service fails to answer the call

Docs.param: the timeout value in seconds. Default value (defined by SIP protocol) is used if timeout is zero or negative.
Docs.summary: Continues a call that's on hold.

remarks.para: Continues a call that's on hold. When succeeds, Listener#onCallEstablished is called. The attempt will be timed out if the call is not established within timeout seconds and Listener#onError onError(SipAudioCall, SipErrorCode.TIME_OUT, String) will be called.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if the SIP service fails to unhold the call

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SendDtmf(int32 code) cil managed
abstract member SendDtmf : int -> unit override this.SendDtmf : int -> unit

Docs.param: the DTMF code to send. Value 0 to 15 (inclusive) are valid inputs.
Docs.summary: Sends a DTMF code.

remarks.para: Sends a DTMF code. According to RFC 2883, event 0--9 maps to decimal value 0--9, '*' to 10, '#' to 11, event 'A'--'D' to 12--15, and event flash to 16. Currently, event flash is not supported.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the DTMF code to send. Value 0 to 15 (inclusive) are valid inputs.
the result message to send when done
Docs.summary: Sends a DTMF code.

remarks.para: Sends a DTMF code. According to RFC 2883, event 0--9 maps to decimal value 0--9, '*' to 10, '#' to 11, event 'A'--'D' to 12--15, and event flash to 16. Currently, event flash is not supported.

Docs.summary: Starts the audio for the established call.

remarks.para:
Starts the audio for the established call. This method should be called after Listener#onCallEstablished is called.

Note: Requires the android.Manifest.permission#RECORD_AUDIO, android.Manifest.permission#ACCESS_WIFI_STATE and android.Manifest.permission#WAKE_LOCK permissions.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
